item3.tips2: We bridge the gap in medical services, guiding you on your path to health with meticulous care.
item3.tips3: Specialized services in medical intermediary, cherishing each step and promising the highest quality medical experiences.

item3.title: Mission Statement
item3.desc: SEA is dedicated to providing warm homes through professional real estate intermediary services.
item3.tips1: Medical intermediaries support health, travel intermediaries explore unknown beauty, adding color to unique journeys.
item3.tips2: These constitute our mission statement, based on compassion, expertise, and creativity. We meet diverse needs for homes, health, and travel, collectively creating wonderful chapters of a happy life.

item4.title: Careers
item4.desc: We implement a recruitment system for new graduates, second new graduates, and inexperienced IT engineers.
item4.tips1: Qualifications: Graduates or expected graduates of junior colleges, four-year or six-year universities, as well as graduates or expected graduates of universities, graduate schools, and vocational training schools (applicants with work experience can also apply). Applications are welcome regardless of nationality (Japanese language proficiency is required), and proficiency in English is highly desirable. Even those without experience can apply! We believe that a sincere and positive attitude towards work is important.
item4.tips2: Desired qualities: Communication and coordination skills with team members and clients. Responsible, honest, and serious approach to work. Able to progress work responsibly while collaborating with others. Proactive in taking on new challenges. Flexible in responding to changes in business.
item4.tips3: Salary: From 180,000 yen (Experienced individuals will be given preferential treatment.) *Regular employment system available.
item4.tips5: Holidays: Over 120 days of annual holidays. Complete two-day weekends (Saturday and Sunday).
item4.tips6: How to apply: Send an email to info@sea-itsoft.com, fill out the resume template, and send it to the above address.

supportList.tex1: Development, repair, and construction of computer systems
supportList.tex2: Installation, construction, and maintenance of internet servers
supportList.tex3: Guidance and education on computer systems

adress.title: Company Details

main.title1: With the mission of “increasing, helping, supporting, and connecting landlords,” we provide real estate investment trading support and asset management services to help you build a stable foundation for your life and realize your dreams.
main.title2: With the experience and knowledge of our staff, all of whom are real estate investors, we offer optimal solutions to our clients.

item1.title: Increase the number of landlords
item1.desc: We provide total support for real estate buying and selling, focusing on single-unit income-generating properties, from individuals investing for the first time to corporate clients considering large-scale investments such as commercial buildings. We also cover tax consulting and risk management related to investment projects.
item1.tips1: Total support for real estate investment, from new land purchase to revitalization
item1.tips3: Compatible with a variety of properties (condominiums, apartments, commercial buildings, hotels, offices, stores, etc.)
item1.tips4: Corporate establishment / account opening / financial planning / support for obtaining bank financing
item1.tips5: Insurance consulting such as fire insurance and earthquake insurance
item1.tips6: Support for overseas investment projects (Mainland America, Hawaii, Australia, etc.)

item2.title: Help the landlord
item2.desc: Management and tax consulting for major businesses
item2.tips2: Consulting regarding private lodging, simple lodging, and hotel management
item2.tips3: Proposals for tax planning including fixed assets and income tax
item2.tips4: From repair, reform, renovation, and refinement proposals to after-construction follow-up

item3.title: Connect landlords
item3.desc: By creating opportunities to connect landlords/property owners and sharing experiences and knowledge, we provide a place to make friends to live a better life and realize your dreams.
item3.tips1: Conclusion of various contracts/payment of various expenses/remittance agency
item3.tips2: Recruitment of new tenants through advertisements, etc./Occupancy examination based on applicant's income etc.
item3.tips3: Creation/renewal of various necessary documents such as rental contract/conclusion of renewal contract/Settlement of money at the time of moving out
item3.tips4: Rent collection/Negotiation for revision of rental conditions/Receipt of unreceivables/Complaint handling
item3.tips5: Creation and submission of monthly reports
item3.tips6: Building inspection/handling small-scale repair work/attending move-out/ordering restoration work

item4.title: Support the landlord
item4.desc: We provide a variety of support, including strategic maintenance and management in anticipation of building deterioration as the building ages, proactively attracting tenants when the building is vacant, early response to problems that occur on a daily basis, and cash flow analysis management.
item4.tips1: Conclusion of various contracts/payment of various expenses/remittance agency
item4.tips2: Recruitment of new tenants through advertisements, etc./Occupancy examination based on applicant's income etc.
item4.tips3: Creation/renewal of various necessary documents such as rental contract/conclusion of renewal contract/Settlement of money at the time of moving out
item4.tips4: Rent collection/Negotiation for revision of rental conditions/Receipt of unreceivables/Complaint handling
item4.tips5: Creation and submission of monthly reports
item4.tips6: Building inspection/handling small-scale repair work/attending move-out/ordering restoration work

business.type2_main_title1: In the canvas of your life, we sketch the dream of a cozy home. With carefully selected properties
business.type2_main_title2: we dedicate ourselves to building warm, secure, and livable houses.
business.type2_main_title3: Join hands with us and let your home become the most beautiful part of your life's journey.
business.type2_section1_sub_title: Real estate support for choosing a home based on your living situation
business.type2_section1_context: Here, we not only build houses, but also create comfortable and harmonious living. We pay attention to every detail and create a livable space, making your living environment an exquisite reflection of the quality of life. Let’s work together to create a warm, safe and healthy home, making every day a wonderful experience of living.
business.type2_section1_service_item1: Comprehensive support for property purchases, from land purchase to freedom to build.
business.type2_section1_service_item3: Compatible with a variety of properties (apartments, apartments, houses, etc.)
business.type2_section1_service_item4: Fire insurance, earthquake insurance and other insurance consultation
business.type2_section2_title: Choosing a home that supports your lifestyle
business.type2_section2_sub_title: Personalized Choices, Choose the Ideal Home that Supports Your Lifestyle.
business.type2_section2_context: In the canvas of your life, we sketch the dream of a cozy home. With carefully selected properties, we dedicate ourselves to building warm, secure, and livable houses. Join hands with us and let your home become the most beautiful part of your life's journey.
business.type2_section2_service_item2: Tax planning advice including fixed assets and income tax
business.type2_section2_service_item3: From repair, remodeling, and renovation proposals to after-construction follow-up

main.title1: We provide an intermediary service that matches customers with Japanese medical institutions for customers in Asia, including China.
main.title2: We also partner with medical and related institutions in Asia to provide support for after-sales follow-up after patients return home.

type3.subtitle: For customers residing in Asia, we provide a series of services for treatment of diseases, medical checkups, and cosmetic surgery, from not only support during consultations in Japan, but also hearing of needs and follow-up support according to diagnosis results. I will do it.

item1.title: Premium Medical Care
item1.description: We pledge to provide excellent quality medical services, from the initial consultation to the completion of treatment, aiming to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

item2.title: Collaboration with Global Medical Experts
item2.description: Through close collaboration with global medical experts, we offer diverse medical choices to ensure the diversity of medical plans and provide surprising experiences.

item3.title: Safe and Reliable Medical Assurance
item3.description: Prioritizing your safety and health, we offer comprehensive medical assurance services to ensure you feel secure and fully enjoy the treatment process.

item4.title: Personalized Medical Experiences
item4.description: Working closely with medical experts, we create personalized medical experiences for you, allowing you to discover unique and unforgettable moments during treatment.

item1.tex: Our staff who are qualified as medical interpreters will introduce you to appropriate personnel and medical institutions.

item2.tex: Total support from Chinese staff who understand Japanese culture

btmSection.title: Medical services, we care about your health
btmSection.tex1: We provide high quality medical services and care about your health. Our professional medical team provides meticulous medical care to ensure you have the best treatment experience. Our mission is to protect your health and provide comprehensive medical support so your life is full of vitality and happiness.
btmSection.tex2: Here, the provision of care is even more important than just treatment. We deeply understand that health is the foundation of life. That's why we provide comprehensive medical services to help you live a healthy and happy life. Choosing us is truly choosing care for your health.

main.title1: We provide intermediary services with Japanese travel agencies to clients in Asia, including China.
main.title2: We also work with tourism and related organizations in Asia to support tourists visiting Japan.

type4.subtitle: We explore unknown and miraculous places and offer our customers unique and unforgettable travel experiences. From enchanting scenery to cultural depth, we'll meet your expectations for your ideal vacation.

item1.title: Excellent service quality
item1.description: We are committed to providing exceptional service quality and aim to meet your requirements and exceed your expectations from booking to trip completion.

item2.title: global partners
item2.description: Working closely with our global partners, we offer a wide range of travel options to ensure your itinerary is full of variety and surprises.

item3.title: Safe and reliable travel guarantee
item3.description: We value your safety and health and provide comprehensive travel protection services so that you can travel with peace of mind.

item4.title: Unique functional experience
item4.description: We combine local characteristics to provide unique experiences, allowing you to discover unique and beautiful moments during your trip.

item1.tex: To accommodate your need for flexibility, we offer friendly booking and cancellation policies to help make your travel plans smoother.

item2.tex: Our team of professional tour guides know every corner of your destination, providing you with a unique perspective on local culture and history.

item3.tex: With the customer at the center, we customize unique itineraries based on individual tastes and desires, ensuring every traveler has a personalized journey.

btmSection.title: Digitization of travel services
btmSection.tex1: We offer highly specialized consultation via online consultation, including staff at the destination store and professional staff on each trip.
btmSection.tex2: Dynamically package JR trains, airplanes, and lodging to improve product selection flexibility. Prices are also flexibly optimized.
